oai_dc:dc.dc:title: MODIFIED SHRINKING CORE MODEL FOR REVERSIBLE SORPTION ON ION-EXCHANGE RESINS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BHANDARI, VM
JUVEKAR, VA
PATWARDHAN, SR
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: kinetics
ion exchange
acid sorption
weak base resin
shrinking core model
modeling
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A modified shrinking core model is proposed to correlate dynamics of acid sorption on weak base ion-exchange resins in free base form. The model considers reversibility of the sorption process which is ignored in the conventional shrinking core model. The model is easy to apply and is shown to yield results which are in agreement with a computationally intensive rigorous model. The model is successfully verified using the experimental data on sorption of strong acids (HCI and HNO3) on weak base resins (Dowex WGR-2 and Amberlite IRA-93).
